Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to recertification for paratransit
Summary: Allows individuals to use correspondence from a licensed physician, dated within the preceding thirty days, indicating that paratransit service is necessary for such individual, in place of in-person recertification.
LawCode: Amd ยง1299-f, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to recertification for paratransit service
